help_content:
EnergyPy Help

This application allows you to schedule the shutdown or restart of your system easily.

Schedule by time

Enter a value and select the unit (seconds, minutes or hours). Then choose whether you want to shut down or restart the system and click 'Schedule'.

Schedule by hour

Enter the exact time in HH:MM format (24 hours). Then choose whether you want to shut down or restart the system and click 'Schedule'.

Cancel

To cancel a scheduled action, click the 'Cancel' button.

Keyboard shortcuts

- Ctrl+C: Cancel scheduled action
- Ctrl+Tab: Switch between tabs
- Ctrl+T: Change theme
